title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Other Resources
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Other Resources              Other Resources      FEATURE PAGES A variety of in-depth information about the park is available on the History & Culture and Nature & Science pages. Many of these features were first published in the park's interpretive  newletter, Spanning the Gap. Use the Quick Index for Spanning the Gap or index or the search engine at the top left to find material.  JUNIOR RANGER PROGRAMS This park's junior ranger program can be used by school groups. For a Junior Park Ranger Activity Booklet, contact the park. Students can also become Webrangers with the National Park Service's on line junior ranger program.  Park Bookstore The park's bookstores are operated by Eastern National. Eastern National has also published several works specifically on this park.
